value:
$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Ummm... I still can't think
of anything!$k$p$nMPID_ニニアン|Tiki, let's think about it later...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Halloween20,Face|Don't worry about the battle!
Just leave this to me!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|I will show the fools at this
festival a harvest of despair.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|This tournament is no war, but...we
ought to show off enough strength
to entertain the attendees.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイナ,ch09_21_Ina_F_Halloween20,Face|Right. That way we can gather
the most sweets possible...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Um, sir?$k$pI thought as hard as I could to
come up with a way to help you
stop feeling sad...$k$pBut...I couldn't think of anything.
I'm so sorry...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|There is nothing to apologize for.
Your care and concern after only
our short conversation...$k$pThat alone is quite enough.
You are a kind child.$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|But...when I was sad, my friend
Mar-Mar helped me...$k$pSo this time, I wanted to help
someone, but...I couldn't.$k$p$nMPID_ニニアン|Tiki...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイナ,ch09_21_Ina_F_Halloween20,Face|Let me offer a humble opinion,
Your Majesty...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|Please, Ena, speak your mind.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイナ,ch09_21_Ina_F_Halloween20,Face|We are at a festival, so...why not
enjoy it together, you and Tiki?$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|...If we did, that would help you
stop being sad?$k$pThen let's! I'd love to explore
the festival together with you!
Er...is that all right, Ninian?$k$p$nMPID_ニニアン|Of course...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Halloween20,Face|Oh, are we all going together?
Sounds nice... Am I invited?$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Xane! Yes, join us!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|...Shall we be off then? We have
a mountain of treats to collect for
dear Tiki, here.$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Yay!$k$pS-sir, can I...hold your hand
while we walk?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|You may. Just as my children
did so long ago...$k$p$Sbs150|
